Name: Muir-Torre syndrome
Definition: A Lynch syndrome that is characterized by a propensity to develop cancers of the gastrointestinal tract

Name: hereditary nonpolyposis colorectal cancer type 8
Definition: A Lynch syndrome that has_material_basis_in heterozygous deletion of the 3' part of the EPCAM gene and intergenic regions adjacent to the MSH2 gene on chromosome 2p21. This results in transcriptional read-through and silencing of MSH2 in tissues expressing EPCAM.

Name: Lynch syndrome 1
Definition: A Lynch syndrome that has_material_basis_in heterozygous mutations in the MSH2 gene on chromosome 2p21-p16.

Name: hereditary nonpolyposis colorectal cancer type 5
Definition: A Lynch syndrome that has_material_basis_in heterozygous mutation in the MSH6 gene on chromosome 2p16.

Name: hereditary nonpolyposis colorectal cancer type 6
Definition: A Lynch syndrome that has_material_basis_in heterozygous mutation in the TGFBR2 gene on chromosome 3p22.

Name: hereditary nonpolyposis colorectal cancer type 2
Definition: A Lynch syndrome that has_material_basis_in mutations in the MLH1 gene on chromosome 3p22.2.

Name: hereditary nonpolyposis colorectal cancer type 4
Definition: A Lynch syndrome that has_material_basis_in heterozygous mutation in the PMS2 gene on chromosome 7p22.

Name: hereditary nonpolyposis colorectal cancer type 7
Definition: A Lynch syndrome that has_material_basis_in mutation in the MLH3 gene on chromosome 14q24.3.
